messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] language, and cool names
messages.msgSnippet: My boys had a Valentine s Day party after their home school, largely unschooled, bowling league today.  As we were preparing our valentine s this AM, I was
messages.messageBody:
My boys had a Valentine's Day party after their home school, largely
unschooled, bowling league today. As we were preparing our valentine's this
AM, I was highly impressed with the list of recipients names. There wasn't
a top ten name in the bunch. Names are fascinating to me, thanks for
sharing Samson Cowboy.

Tracie

Mom to Graham, Dane and Declan



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: language, and cool names
messages.msgSnippet: There are flooding stories on the news tonight.  It rained for two days in New Mexico, which is unusual.  It rained over an inchin 24 hours at our house.  But
messages.messageBody:
There are flooding stories on the news tonight. It rained for two days in New Mexico, which is unusual. It rained over an inchin 24 hours at our house. But on the Navajo Nation's land, they had serious problems with dirt roads.

Their officer of safety has a very cool name I thought would impress you all:

Samson Cowboy

That is one cool name for a Navajo tribal officer.

Sandra
